disable: DC 34  Thievery  (expert) to identify and harmlessly cut the taut wiring
immunity_markdown: critical hits, object immunities, precision damage
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Hazard 12" pfs="">[Explosive Furniture Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=228)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 18</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Wiring keeping the furniture together unravels, causing the spring-loaded pieces of furniture and wire to shoot outward.

---

**Stealth**
DC 30 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 34 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) to identify and harmlessly cut the taut wiring

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 33, **Fort** +25, **Ref** +19

**Hardness**
21

**HP**
84 (BT 42)

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Unsprung Wires** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature moves within 5 feet of the pile of broken furniture; **Effect** The pile of furniture and entangling wires explodes outward. The trap deals 6d10+27 slashing damage (DC 32 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a failed save, the target takes a –10-foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure).
name: Explosive Furniture Trap
